actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to revise the boundary of Saguaro National Monument in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the revision of the boundary of Saguaro National Monument in the State of Arizona. Authorizes the appropriations as necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to revise the boundary of Saguaro National Monument in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.
